titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2216) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2217) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-95, by Mr. Webster (FL).
Resolution provides for one hour of general debate for each bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 29.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 243.
DEBATE - The House continued with further debate on H. Res. 243.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 193 (Roll no. 186).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 194 (Roll no. 187).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/3/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2216) making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2217) making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2014.
